posts.post_content:
I have a stunning (undergraded) PSA 6 T205 example of Ed Konetchy (which should be resubmitted for a bump. i would do it myself, but i don't belong to PSA anymore). 

I'd like to swap for one (or a few) nice PSA T206(s). southern leaugers, HOFers, commons (preferably graded 5 or higher), rare backs, error cards, etc... 

obviously we'd discuss values through PM's.

thanks!
